thread.section_title: AirportsFirst Taxi Service Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AirportsFirst Taxi Service | airportsfirsttaxi.com
thread.title: Katrina Latyshava
thread.title_full: AirportsFirst Taxi Service reviewed by Katrina Latyshava

author: Katrina Latyshava
title: Katrina Latyshava
text:
I had to book in emergency on the day of my flight as my Fav cab company had some technical issues and couldn't deliver the service.
Well, I have no regrets whatsoever I had booked with Airports First Taxis!
Really good service and even Cheaper then I was expecting.
I will definitely use the service again!
